definitions.definition: To design , fashion , make , or arrange in a certain way or form (style).
To call or give a name or title to.
examples: The pope is style d His or Your Holiness.

definitions.definition: To create for, or give to, someone a style , fashion , or image , particularly one which is regarded as attractive , tasteful , or trendy .
To act in a way which seeks to show that one possesses style.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To design , fashion , make , or arrange in a certain way or form (style).
secondary_definitions: ( transitive , formal ) To call or give a name or title to.
( transitive , informal ) To create for, or give to, someone a style , fashion , or image , particularly one which is regarded as attractive , tasteful , or trendy .
( intransitive , US , informal ) To act in a way which seeks to show that one possesses style.
